Metadata.Title: Use Session Management Offered by the Framework
Metadata.DirectLink: Use Session Management Offered by the Framework

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Java

What to Do

Use session management offered by the framework.

Why

The framework works on a lower level than the application and is therefore better suited to provide session management. Most mature web application frameworks offer secure session management functionality.

How

To use session management offered by the framework, please refer to the documentation for your chosen framework. Most Java frameworks take advantage of HttpSession objects.
